translation.en: How about a story?
Let's see. Where to begin?
translation.zh: ‎我们看看啊 从哪里开始呢？

translation.en: Last year, our dairy farm officially opened the Bernet Farm Wine Vineyards.
translation.zh:
‎我们奶牛场里的贝奈特葡萄园
‎去年正式开业了

translation.en: Even though we don't have to step on grapes to make wine nowadays,
translation.zh:
‎尽管我们现在不需要
‎脚踩葡萄的酿酒技术了

translation.en: I convinced my sister that grapes squishing between your toes makes people happy.
translation.zh:
‎但我说服我姐姐
‎葡萄在脚趾间破裂能给人带来快乐

translation.en: It was my mom's favorite.
I spent most weekends learning everything there is about dairy farming
translation.zh:
‎大部分周末时间 我都泡在农场里 ‎学习奶牛养殖技术
‎这样我就能多多帮忙了

translation.en: so I can help out even more around here.
translation.zh:
‎学习奶牛养殖技术
‎这样我就能多多帮忙了

translation.en: I had the best teachers.
Well, teacher.
My sister Callie still runs the place, of course.
translation.zh: ‎当然 我姐姐凯莉仍然在经营这里

translation.en: And with the extra money from the wine,
we were finally able to hire some extra farmhands.
And yet, Callie never stops getting her hands dirty,
translation.zh: ‎尽管如此 凯莉还是亲力亲为

translation.en: but I've never seen her so happy.
Okay.
Come this way.
No dust got in any eyes. Right?
Manny here is not only our property manager
translation.zh: ‎曼尼不仅是我们的农场经理

translation.en: but our esteemed vintner and sommelier.
translation.zh: ‎也是我们尊敬的酿酒师和侍酒师

translation.en: -Now, Manny. -Yes.
Have you tried this bottle yet?
I have never met you. And I have never tried this bottle before.
translation.zh: ‎我从没见过你们 也没试喝过这瓶酒

translation.en: Okay.
Feast your eyes. [sniffs]
-Birch sap. -[Callie] Mm.
Honeysuckle.
[smacks lips] Chocolat.
[smacks lips, sighs] And ground coriander! It's a gift.
-[Manny] No. I've been practicing a lot. -[Callie chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎没啦 我努力练习来着 是的

translation.en: [girl] But we all know moms makes the best guardian angels.
translation.zh:
‎但我们都知道
‎妈妈是最棒的守护天使

translation.en: -I know she's here with us every day. -[cows mooing]
translation.zh: ‎我知道她每天都跟我们在一起

translation.en: Especially today.
Hey, Hannah. Are you ready to do this?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 汉娜 你准备好了吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
Let's go.
-Hey. Are you okay? -[panting] Yeah. I'm fine.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 你还好吗？
‎-是的 我很好

translation.en: -Let's practice. -What?
[man] I'm gonna get it!
And you guys are here on a very special day
translation.zh: ‎你们来巧了 今天是一个特别的日子

translation.en: because today we are paying homage
to the innovation of historical…
[chuckles] Of, uh…
uh… uh, very, uh, historical innovations and--
While including the new innovations of wine-making
introduced over the past few years.
Nailed it. [chuckles]
[Callie] Speaking of innovations,
translation.zh: ‎说到创新 你们正在品尝最新产品

translation.en: you guys are trying the newest addition. Would you like to see him try another one?
translation.zh:
‎说到创新 你们正在品尝最新产品 ‎-想不想看他试喝其他的？
‎-我不喝了！

translation.en: No! You guys need to stay safe. Okay? Can't be drinking that much.
translation.zh:
‎-想不想看他试喝其他的？
‎-我不喝了！ ‎我得保障大家安全 对吧？
‎不能喝那么多

translation.en: Uh, well… well, there's a Syrah. I think you should show them how…
translation.zh:
‎这里有一瓶席拉
‎我觉得你应该向大家展示一下…

translation.en: -Joseph! -Hey!
How's everybody doing today? Good?
Everyone, this is Joseph Van Aston, my boyfriend.
translation.zh:
‎各位 这位是约瑟夫范阿斯顿
‎他是我的男朋友

translation.en: Oh. Okay. [scoffs]
You taking a… a wine break, babe?
translation.zh: ‎你是在饮酒小憩吗 宝贝？

translation.en: [smacks lips] Yes, yes. Yes, I am.
H… he loves the wine.
It was exactly one year ago that I stumbled onto this property
translation.zh: ‎就在一年前 我偶然发现了这处农场

translation.en: and became a ranch hand.
And I didn't know it at the time…
…but it was the best thing that ever happened to me.
translation.zh: ‎但这是我经历过的最美好的事情

translation.en: Callie, I know what life is like without you.
translation.zh: ‎凯莉 我知道没有你的日子是什么样

translation.en: And I know what life is like with you.
translation.zh:
‎我也知道
‎跟你在一起的日子是什么样的

translation.en: And it would be my honor and privilege…
to spend the rest of this life with you.
So, Callie Bernet…
-…will you marry me? -[gasps, laughs]
[gasps] Yes, yes, yes!
All right! Yes!
Get a room.
-I'm gonna go to bed. -Okay.
Oh. It means so much to me that you guys up and left the tour for this.
translation.zh:
‎你们改变行程来这里
‎对我来说意义重大

translation.en: Congratulations, Cal.
Thank you.
Yeah. I, uh… I gotta go too. I… I got a date.
With me.
Somebody may have downloaded Deep Down Under on the Ocu-VR,
translation.zh:
‎有人可能已经在虚拟现实游戏机上
‎下载好《海底深处》了

translation.en: and it may put us in a shark tank in South Africa,
translation.zh: ‎可能会把我们扔进南非的鲨鱼缸里

translation.en: where it breaks, you swim, you live, you die.
translation.zh:
‎结果设施坏掉
‎你要游泳逃命 最后被吃掉

translation.en: You die! Yes! I'm gonna set that up right now.
translation.zh: ‎被吃掉！太棒了！我现在就要开始

translation.en: Hey. Don't stay out too late. You got a big delivery at sunup.
translation.zh: ‎别熬太晚 明天清晨还要送很多货物

translation.en: Yes, sir. Ma'am.
So, you gonna stick around for a few days? No. Just tonight.
translation.zh:
‎-你要在这里住几天吗？
‎-只住一晚

translation.en: Got the big annual gala coming up, and it's, you know, lots to do.
translation.zh:
‎一年一度的节日庆典就要开始了
‎有很多事情要做

translation.en: Gala? That sounds fancy.
[inhales deeply] More like overblown and extravagant.
I never heard you complain before.
It's not really my thing anymore.
I'd much rather be here with you.
translation.zh: ‎我更愿意待在这里 跟你腻在一起

translation.en: -[man] Well, we'd love to have you, sir. -Now. Do it. Both of you.
Uh, we're gonna pass.
Callie, can I… can I borrow you for a second?
I, uh… I need your advice.
Uh, yeah, sure. I'll be right back.
It's been over a year, sir. The city misses you.
translation.zh: ‎已经一年多了 先生 城市很想念你

translation.en: Does it?
Mm. Well, I do.
Partner! Are you coming or not?
translation.zh:
‎-反正我想你了
‎-小伙伴！ ‎你到底来不来？

translation.en: So, what's up, lover boy?
Okay. Shut it. -We're just friends. -[Callie laughs]
translation.zh: ‎好了 打住吧 我们只是朋友

translation.en: Look, she needed a tour manager.
I needed a change of scenery. You know the deal.
translation.zh: ‎我需要换换环境 各取所需

translation.en: Hmm. Friends don't travel the country together in a tiny trailer.
translation.zh:
‎普通朋友是不会共乘一辆拖车
‎同游全国的

translation.en: [woman] Polaroid time!
Here. Let me take it.
-[woman] The ring. -Okay.
-[electronic music playing] -[Manny] All right. All right. Straight to the kneecaps! Straight to the kneecaps!
translation.zh: ‎好的 我们到了 直接打膝盖！

translation.en: -Oh. Whoa, whoa. -Shark! Shark! Let me out! Let me out!
Get your character off my ear, Leo!
translation.zh: ‎让你的角色放开我的耳朵 利奥！

translation.en: [Leo] Get off!
-Yes! -Yes! -Yes! -Yes! Yes!
That must have been amazing.
Oh my gosh. I'm so sorry. What did you wanna talk to me about?
translation.zh: ‎天啊 抱歉 你想跟我说什么来着？

translation.en: It doesn't matter. -[woman] Mm-hmm. -We gotta go.
-Bye. -Bye, Cal.
Uh, go check on Joseph. Upstairs.
-[woman] Hmm. -What?
[Callie] Coffee's up.
-[cows mooing] -[Manny] Oh. Thank you.
Hey.
[sighs] I've been waiting for this all morning.
-[chuckles] -That was supposed to be mine.
Mm-mm. I got some good news.
translation.zh: ‎那杯应该是我的 ‎我有一个好消息

translation.en: Sick order this a.m.
We got 30 cases of the Cabernet Blend,
30 cases of the Syrah, and 25 cases of the Noir.
What?
-I wonder who the buyer is. -[cows mooing]
Van Aston Enterprises?
F… for their holiday gala.
The overblown extravaganza?
Yes, but it could be great marketing for the winery.
translation.zh:
‎是的 但对酿酒厂来说
‎是个推广的好机会

translation.en: Last year we had 50 cases of Jensen's going for $21 a pour.
translation.zh:
‎去年我们买了50箱杰森琴酒
‎每瓶21美元

translation.en: Joseph, this is amazing. -That's my boy, right there! -[all chuckling]
translation.zh:
‎-约瑟夫 太棒了
‎-小兄弟 好样的！

translation.en: Don't come any closer. -You know what? Don't touch me, dude. -[Leo breathing heavily]
translation.zh:
‎别再靠近了 不要…
‎你知道吗？不要碰到我 老兄

translation.en: Sore loser. My K/D ratio is higher than yours.
translation.zh:
‎-输不起呢
‎-我的击杀/死亡率比你高

translation.en: Whatever. Joseph, can I speak to you for a second, please?
translation.zh: ‎随便吧 约瑟夫 我能跟你谈谈吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Sure.
I thought you were headed back. [sighs] I overslept.
translation.zh:
‎-我以为你回去了
‎-我睡过头了

translation.en: -There's something I need you to know. -What?
Remember that wellness retreat your mother took the C-suites to back in October?
translation.zh:
‎还记得十月份
‎你妈妈带着管理层去疗养吗？

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. They went to some island to shove wheatgrass up--
translation.zh: ‎记得 他们跑到一个小岛上收麦草…

translation.en: Spare me the details.
There's, uh… there's a way to say this. Um…
She's Downward Dogging with the sexy sutra kata Shavasana man
translation.zh:
‎她在跟一个性感瑜伽大师
‎练习下犬式伸展呢

translation.en: in Tahiti, and she's not coming back.
translation.zh: ‎是去大溪地了 而且不会回来了

translation.en: Long story short, she ran away with her yoga instructor.
translation.zh: ‎简单来说 她和瑜伽教练私奔了

translation.en: And she's left the company in your name. What? Why am I just now hearing about this?
translation.zh:
‎-她把公司转到你的名下了
‎-什么？为什么我现在才听说这事？

translation.en: [Leo] Because I didn't wanna spoil yesterday with the news.
translation.zh: ‎因为我不想让这件事毁掉昨天的求婚

translation.en: [exhales] But don't worry. Victoria is there. She's trying--
translation.zh:
‎但是别担心 有维多利亚呢
‎她在努力…

translation.en: Please tell me they didn't leave Victoria in charge.
translation.zh:
‎别告诉我
‎他们让维多利亚负责公司事务了

translation.en: -The board voted her in as temporary CEO. -[Joseph] Ugh.
translation.zh: ‎董事会选举她为临时首席执行官了

translation.en: -She's got them wrapped around her finger. -She doesn't care about the company.
translation.zh:
‎-她把他们都搞定了呢
‎-她根本不在乎公司

translation.en: She was your mom's right hand.
But things are falling apart.
The suppliers are dropping like flies.
I know you needed a break. And I… and I appreciate that for you and Callie.
translation.zh:
‎我知道你需要休息
‎我很理解你和凯莉

translation.en: But this is your father's company we're talking about.
He's gotta be rolling in his grave right now.
translation.zh: ‎他现在在坟墓里肯定都被气活了

translation.en: Why would my mother just leave everything behind?
Because of you and Callie.
Your love.
It inspired her to find one of her own.
translation.zh: ‎激发她去寻找自己的爱情了

translation.en: Okay.
I'll go.
Do a little damage control but only for a little while.
translation.zh: ‎控制公司的损失 但只待一段时间

translation.en: -I guess I owe my mother a call. -Uh, don't bother.
translation.zh:
‎-看来我得给我妈妈打电话了
‎-不用了

translation.en: Cell service is nonexistent on the island.
Yeah. Take a break. I'll fill you in.
translation.zh:
‎好了 休息一下吧
‎有消息我会通知你的

translation.en: [Manny] So pump number seven is out again. I've tried and tried to fix it but--
translation.zh:
‎七号泵又出故障了
‎我尝试维修了 但是…

translation.en: Okay. Call the manufacturer and tell them to send us a new one.
translation.zh: ‎好的 打电话给制造商 让他们换新吧

translation.en: You want to replace the valve. I'll check if the supply levels are even.
translation.zh:
‎我们想要更换阀门
‎我去看看供应量是否稳定

translation.en: -Okay. Thank you. -[Manny] Yep.
Hello!
-[laughs] -Hi!
[woman] Surprise!
-Oh my God! Oh my God! -[woman squeals] Oh my God!
I'm so bummed I missed your proposal last night. I had to pass my anatomy final.
translation.zh:
‎错过你的求婚了 我好郁闷啊
‎我解剖学的期末考试必须得过

translation.en: It's fine. You weren't supposed to be here for a few days.
translation.zh: ‎没关系啦 你不是要过几天才能来嘛

translation.en: I know. I just couldn't wait.
Well, where is he? -Oh. -I can't wait to meet him!
translation.zh: ‎他在哪里？我等不及要见他了！

translation.en: All right, the supply levels are even.
-[woman] Congratulations! -What?
I'm Brandy. Best friend, maid of honor, etcetera,
translation.zh: ‎我是布兰迪 凯莉的闺蜜 婚礼的伴娘

translation.en: and now we're gonna be best friends too, of course.
-Okay! [laughs] -[Brandy screams]
[chuckles] Get in here.
-Okay. -Best day of my life.
translation.zh:
‎-一起抱
‎-好好 ‎-美好的一天
‎-我好激动！

translation.en: -[Brandy] I'm so excited! -[all laughing]
-Hey. What did I miss? -I love this!
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 我错过什么了吗？
‎-我喜欢这样！

translation.en: Uh, Brandy, this is Joseph, my fiancé.
translation.zh: ‎布兰迪 这是约瑟夫 我的未婚夫

translation.en: Hey.
Hey. Yay.
-What's going on? -[clears throat]
And this is Manny, our property manager.
translation.zh: ‎这位是曼尼 我们的农场经理

translation.en: -And your new best friend. -You are actually coworkers now.
translation.zh:
‎-也是你的新闺蜜
‎-现在你们是同事了

translation.en: -Coworkers? -Yes.
Brandy is studying to be an on-field livestock veterinarian
translation.zh:
‎布兰迪正在学习
‎成为一名野外牲畜兽医

translation.en: and needs a few extra credits for her internship.
translation.zh: ‎她需要进行实习 获得额外的学分

translation.en: [smacks lips] So I'm gonna be moving in for a few months!
-Yay! -[laughing]
Fiesta! Fiesta! Fiesta! Fiesta!
-Yay! -Hey!
So, tell me about this gala that cleared out our entire winter stash. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎跟我说说这场
‎把我们冬季存货都买走的节日庆典吧

translation.en: Well, technically, it is
the Van Aston Enterprises City Holiday Alliance Gala.
translation.zh: ‎这是范阿斯顿集团城市节日联合庆典

translation.en: That's a mouthful.
We woo our shareholders and potential investors
translation.zh: ‎我们用精致的装饰和丰盛的大餐

translation.en: with elaborate decorations and a fancy meal,
and then all the suppliers show up
and schmooze with them and the board of direct--
It… it's very fascinating stuff.
-Cal. -Hmm?
You know I… I love you, right? And our life here.
translation.zh:
‎你知道我爱你 对吧？
‎也爱我们在这里的生活

translation.en: What's going on?
I gotta go to the city for a while.
-How long? -I don't know.
But I was hoping that you could come with me to San Francisco.
translation.zh: ‎但我希望 ‎你能跟我一起去旧金山

translation.en: We can finally have some time to ourselves.
translation.zh: ‎我们终于可以有自己的时间了

translation.en: Celebrate.
Plan the wedding.
There's a reason we haven't had a day off all year long, Joseph.
translation.zh:
‎约瑟夫 我们整年都没有休息
‎是有原因的

translation.en: Oh, we're running this place on autopilot.
translation.zh: ‎经营这里不需要我们亲力亲为了

translation.en: And I've been… I've been wanting to take you to San Francisco for a while now.
[smacks lips] We can hire extra help.
Manny can manage the farm and the winery. And… and Brandy, she can keep an eye on Hannah.
translation.zh:
‎曼尼可以管理奶牛场和酿酒厂
‎布兰迪可以照顾汉娜

translation.en: You've got this thing all planned out, don't you?
And now I feel guilt coming in from all sides.
translation.zh: ‎现在我的内疚感从四面八方涌来

translation.en: What do you mean?
I guess part of me kept him so busy around here
translation.zh: ‎我想部分原因是 我让他忙得团团转

translation.en: so we wouldn't have time to go visit the city.
Cal.
I'm worried we'll get there, he'll miss his old life.
translation.zh:
‎我担心我们到那里以后
‎他会怀念以前的生活

translation.en: I don't know. I just… I don't want anything to change.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 我只是…不想改变任何事情

translation.en: Cal, you're getting married. Okay? Change is inevitable.
translation.zh: ‎凯莉 你要结婚了 改变是必然的

translation.en: And who knows? Maybe you'll fall in love with his world
the way that he fell in love with yours.
You deserve this.
It's okay to let a little light in.
Okay.
What would your mom say?
I can feel her here, you know.
translation.zh: ‎我能感觉到她在这里 你懂的

translation.en: Me too.
[Callie] Hannah, what time do you catch the bus this morning?
translation.zh: ‎汉娜 你早上几点的校车？

translation.en: -7:50. -So, right now! Wait.
Come here. I'm gonna miss you.
You listen to Manny and Brandy when I'm gone, okay?
translation.zh:
‎我不在的时候
‎你要听曼尼和布兰迪的话 好吗？

translation.en: And do all your schoolwork without them having to ask.
translation.zh: ‎别用他们过问 按时完成家庭作业

translation.en: Schoolwork? It's the last day before Christmas break.
translation.zh:
‎家庭作业？
‎今天是圣诞假期前的最后一天

translation.en: -Already? -Good. I'll need an extra set of hands.
translation.zh:
‎-这么快吗？
‎-太好了 我正好需要一个帮手

translation.en: [gasps] Oh. The veterinarian comes three days a week for health management on the farm.
translation.zh:
‎兽医每周来三天
‎负责农场的健康管理

translation.en: Manny, you're on your own those days so Brandy can chat with the vet.
translation.zh:
‎曼尼 那几天就靠你了 ‎-布兰迪就可以跟兽医交流经验了
‎-没问题

translation.en: -[Manny] No problem. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh:
‎-布兰迪就可以跟兽医交流经验了
‎-没问题

translation.en: If you need an extra hand or two,
translation.zh:
‎如果你需要帮手
‎德鲁农场的工人有时间

translation.en: the ranch hands on the Drew farm are looking for some extra days.
translation.zh:
‎如果你需要帮手
‎德鲁农场的工人有时间 ‎可以打给他们

translation.en: -There are the numbers to call. -Got it.
And remember, on Sunday after 3:00 p.m…
translation.zh: ‎还有记住了 周日下午三点以后

translation.en: [both] …it's "buy a bottle, take a bottle with your tour ticket."
translation.zh: ‎可以“凭观光票 买一瓶 赠一瓶”

translation.en: -I got it, Callie. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎我知道了 凯莉 ‎-好吧
‎-好了 我们的飞机就要到了！

translation.en: [Joseph] All right. Our ride is almost here!
translation.zh:
‎-好吧
‎-好了 我们的飞机就要到了！

translation.en: Ugh. Hang on a second. Um, I--
-We've got this. Go! -Okay. Okay.
What?
My clothes look great on you.
Okay. We really gotta go.
-[Manny] All right. See you later. -Have fun.
translation.zh:
‎-好吧 回头见
‎-你们玩得开心

translation.en: [Manny] Don't you worry.
Old Manny and Brandy. We got this.
translation.zh: ‎老曼尼和布兰迪 我们可以的

translation.en: That's inappropriate. Excuse me.
translation.zh: ‎这样不太合适 不好意思

translation.en: Oh my God! What?
Welcome.
So what is all this?
Those are the most updated reports
on all suppliers and divisions of Van Aston Enterprises.
translation.zh: ‎所有供应商和部门的最新报告

translation.en: Enjoy.
-[breathes deeply] -And so it begins.
Hey, Johnny.
-It's Rogelio. -It's Rogelio. I knew that.
translation.zh:
‎-我是罗杰利奥
‎-你是罗杰利奥 ‎我知道的

translation.en: I knew that.
[Manny] Okay.
Hot enough for you?
It's me. Uh… [exhales]
I think we're off to a great start.
Uh, you know, just both of us handling the ranch.
translation.zh:

Yes! [laughs]

You okay?
Oh, yeah. It's… it's not you.
It's, um… I'm just a little distracted.
Callie's been unreachable the last few days, and, um,

translation.en: I just hope she's okay.
Hey.

This is Callie we're talking about. [chuckles]
Exactly.
This is Callie we're talking about.
She's a big girl.
Yeah, right.

I thought we were going for a midnight snack.
-All right. Watch your step. -[gasps]
[whispers] Right.

I mean, you single-handedly helped retain 80% of our suppliers.

‎多亏维多利亚

Cheers.

‎解决其他问题了

‎-我昨晚本来要告诉你的…
‎-那现在跟我说说吧

translation.en: What happens to our life in Petaluma?
translation.zh: ‎我们在佩塔卢马的生活怎么办？

translation.en: Oh, I love the life that we've created.
But you, more than anyone, should know this is my dad's company.
translation.zh:
‎但你比任何人都应该知道
‎这是我爸的公司

translation.en: Either I sign the paperwork, or we lose everything that he worked for.
translation.zh:
‎如果我不签字
‎那他的奋斗就付诸东流了

translation.en: [Callie] You can't keep cutting me out like this.
translation.zh: ‎你不能总是这样 事事都不跟我商量

translation.en: It's like you're trying to get rid of me.
-God, no. Callie, we can figure this out-- -Figure yourself out.
translation.zh:
‎-天啊 不是 凯莉 我们可以想办法的
‎-你自己想办法吧

translation.en: I can't marry two of you.
What's that supposed to mean?
I need some air.
Hey.
What did that ever do to you?
I don't want it. Nothing's the same.
translation.zh: ‎我不想要了 一切都变了

translation.en: [smacks lips] It's okay that things change, Hannah.
I mean, if they didn't, then you'd still be wearing diapers.
translation.zh: ‎如果没有变化 那你就还穿着尿布呢

translation.en: But she didn't even know I got stitches.
And now they're out, and she still doesn't care. It's like she forgot about us.
translation.zh:
‎现在他们出去了 她还是不在乎
‎她好像忘记我们了

translation.en: And it's the last Sunday before Christmas.
translation.zh: ‎今天圣诞节前的最后一个星期天

translation.en: This is the day we decorate our tree. She probably forgot about that too.
translation.zh: ‎是我们装饰圣诞树的日子 ‎她可能也忘记了

translation.en: Hey, hey.
Your sister's kind of busy planning the wedding of her dreams.
translation.zh:
‎你姐姐正忙着
‎筹备她梦寐以求的婚礼呢

translation.en: She's getting married Christmas Eve.
How fun will that be?
So let's cut her some slack. Okay?
[inhales] You know what? When she's back, we can punish her
translation.zh: ‎你知道吗？等她回来 我们可以罚她

translation.en: and give her all the poopy jobs that she usually gives us, huh?
translation.zh:
‎把她扔给我们的脏活累活
‎都还给她 好吗？

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay. [chuckles]
Let's decorate a Christmas tree so hard
that they can see that sucker all the way from San Francisco, huh?
translation.zh: ‎让他们在旧金山就能看到 怎么样？

translation.en: Okay?
♪ Of holiday reds and greens ♪
translation.zh: ‎（怎么了？） ‎（我缝针了 不过已经不疼了！）

translation.en: ♪ Santa will be riding in… ♪
-[donkey brays] -[Owen] Come see our Christmas show!
All tickets are donation-based.
Profits support the homeless in the city.
translation.zh: ‎筹款用来接济城里的无家可归者！

translation.en: We serve warm meals all season long.
translation.zh: ‎圣诞节期间 供应免费餐食

translation.en: It's so crowded today.
Most people who come on weekends have jobs.
translation.zh: ‎大多数周末来的人都是有工作的

translation.en: Unless you make a fortune, the city will swallow you up.
translation.zh:
‎除非一夜暴富
‎否则城市会将你吞噬殆尽

translation.en: Especially if you got a family to feed.
So hard to believe.
I mean, it seems like money grows on trees in this city.
translation.zh: ‎我是说 我以为城里遍地是黄金

translation.en: Only for those rich enough to plant them in the first place.
Like the Van Astons.
Oh, yeah.
Speaking of, I was surprised Joseph didn't keep up the donations,
translation.zh:
‎说起来 我很惊讶
‎约瑟夫没有继续捐款了

translation.en: especially after knowing you and I grew up together.
translation.zh: ‎尤其是在他知道我们是儿时好友之后

translation.en: The Van Astons pay for this soup kitchen?
translation.zh: ‎施舍处是范阿斯顿家族赞助的？

translation.en: Yeah. You… you didn't know?
No.
-[sighs] The company is struggling and-- -Oh, don't feel like you need to explain.
translation.zh:
‎-公司现在很艰难…
‎-不要觉得你需要解释

translation.en: We're… we are lucky to have had their support for as long as we did.
translation.zh:
‎我们很幸运了
‎能得到他们那么久的支持

translation.en: Hey, Ainsley.
You wanna help out for a bit before the show?
[smacks lips] Um, no.
Ainsley, this is Callie, my friend from home.
translation.zh: ‎安斯利 这是凯莉 我在家乡的朋友

translation.en: Uh, we hired Ainsley to be our Mother Mary this year.
translation.zh: ‎今年我们雇了安斯利扮演圣母玛利亚

translation.en: Yeah, about that. I can't make it tonight.
I booked a job, so…
translation.zh: ‎我预订了一个活儿 所以…

translation.en: We're on in 20 minutes.
Not my problem.
Who can I possibly find
to play Mother Mary in the next 20 minutes?
translation.zh: ‎我能找谁来扮演圣母玛利亚呢？

translation.en: I forgot my phone.
Good luck.
You sure this is okay?
'Cause we have two performances. You'll be here all day…
translation.zh:
‎我们有两场演出
‎你要在这里待一整天…

translation.en: -I got… I gotta change. -[both chuckle]
What's with the outfit?
I thought you needed an excuse.
Here you go.
Probably more than you'll make all month.
You're welcome.
Whatever.
[Owen] All bringing forth what would soon be known
translation.zh: ‎这位新生的孩子很快将被人们视为

translation.en: as the most precious gift the world would ever receive.
translation.zh: ‎世间前所未有的最珍贵的礼物

translation.en: The God of the universe came to us in the form of a tiny, lowly baby.
translation.zh:
‎上帝以弱小的婴儿形象
‎出现在我们面前

translation.en: So let us keep the spirit of Christmas in our hearts
translation.zh: ‎所以让我们把圣诞节的精神铭记于心

translation.en: for all the days of our lives.
[Owen] Thank you. Thank you all! That's it for now.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 谢谢大家！演出到此结束

translation.en: Stick around for the next show, if you'd like.
translation.zh: ‎如果愿意 可以留下观看下一场演出

translation.en: -Pet Hopey. She's very, very nice. -[Callie laughs]
translation.zh: ‎驴子宝贝 她表现得非常好

translation.en: [recording] Hey, friends. You've reached Callie Bernet.
translation.zh: ‎嘿‎ ‎朋友 我是凯莉贝奈特

translation.en: Please leave a message.
[Owen] You killed it today.
You're a natural Virgin.
-Please never say that again. -[both laugh]
Well, I may be selfish, but I'd love to have you in the city.
translation.zh:
‎我可能有点自私
‎但我想让你留在城里

translation.en: [smacks lips] I missed you.
It really does feel like yesterday.
You and Liam begging me to drive you to the movies.
translation.zh: ‎你和利亚姆求我开车送你们去看电影

translation.en: Life was so simple back then.
You don't remember, do you?
Remember what?
How you and Liam used to fight like dogs over your futures.
translation.zh:
‎讨论到你们的未来
‎你和利亚姆吵得不可开交

translation.en: He wanted you to follow him to UC Davis.
translation.zh: ‎他想让你跟他去加州大学戴维斯分校

translation.en: You wouldn't have that. You had to go to St. Louis
translation.zh: ‎你不愿意 你想像你父亲一样

translation.en: to study social economics and agriculture like your dad.
translation.zh: ‎去圣路易斯学习社会经济学和农学

translation.en: I swear you two had a different plan every week.
translation.zh: ‎我发誓你俩每周都有不同的计划

translation.en: And then we never even got the chance to choose one.
translation.zh: ‎最后我们连选择的机会都没有了

translation.en: You would've worked it out 'cause you loved each other.
translation.zh:
‎你们本来也会解决的
‎因为你们深爱着对方

translation.en: Yeah.
Relationships are all about compromise.
You can't force Joseph to stay away from the city
translation.zh: ‎你不能强迫约瑟夫离开城市

translation.en: any more than he can force you to walk away from the farm.
translation.zh: ‎就像他不能强迫你离开农场一样

translation.en: You and Joseph will work it out.
translation.zh: ‎你和约瑟夫也会想出解决办法的

translation.en: [Victoria] Where you headed?
Um, j… just back to the hotel. It's a block away. I can walk.
translation.zh:
‎回酒店而已 只有一个街区
‎我可以走路回去

translation.en: Nonsense.
Vanilla chai, right?
Thank you.
Tell me, how are you feeling about everything, dear?
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的 跟我说说
‎你觉得这里怎么样？

translation.en: I'm just a little tired of it all, to be honest.
Oh, honey.
If you're tired now, wait until you're a few days out from the big day. You won't sleep a wink.
translation.zh:
‎如果你现在就觉得累了
‎那等到临近婚礼时 你会失眠的

translation.en: I was awake for a full 36 hours before my wedding.
translation.zh: ‎婚礼前整整36小时 我都没有睡觉

translation.en: How long have you been married?
The wedding never happened. We called it off.
translation.zh: ‎没有举行婚礼 我们取消了

translation.en: More like he called it off.
I'm sorry to hear that.
I have to say it looks much better on your hand than it did on mine.
translation.zh:
‎我得说 戒指戴在你的手上
‎比我戴好看多了

translation.en: I always thought my hands were a little too long for an emerald cut.
translation.zh:
‎我一直觉得我的手有点长
‎不适合戴切割绿宝石

translation.en: Looks better on thicker hands.
translation.zh: ‎还是厚一点的手掌戴着更好看

translation.en: You see how the shape elongates the wrist in a way?
translation.zh: ‎能看出来戒指形状显得手腕很长吗？

translation.en: No offense, of… of course. It's beyond gorgeous.
translation.zh: ‎无意冒犯 戒指还是很美的

translation.en: Oh, he didn't tell you we were engaged?
translation.zh: ‎他没告诉你 我们曾经订婚了？

translation.en: [inhales] Oh my.
It seems I'm always revealing too much too soon.
-Callie, what are you doing? -Owen's soup kitchen lost all its funding.
translation.zh:
‎-凯莉 你在干什么？
‎-欧文的施舍处失去了所有资助

translation.en: That's what this is about?
Cal, we had to make cuts to keep the lights on.
translation.zh:
‎凯莉 我们必须削减开支
‎才能维持公司运营

translation.en: I told him we'd try to pick it up after the gala if the suppliers reconfirmed, but--
translation.zh:
‎我跟他说了 如果供应商回心转意
‎我们会继续捐款的…

translation.en: The company can afford to put on a gala
that costs more than what most people make in a year,
translation.zh: ‎花费比大多数人的年收入还多

translation.en: and you're telling me you can't afford to help people
translation.zh: ‎你却跟我说 没钱去捐款

translation.en: who would give anything for a hot meal during the holidays?
translation.zh:
‎帮助那些在节日期间
‎施舍饭食的人吗？

translation.en: The wedding venue, how much does that cost?
translation.zh: ‎婚礼场地呢 要花多少钱？

translation.en: You know, we could get married at the winery for free.
translation.zh:
‎我们可以在酿酒厂举办婚礼
‎不用花钱

translation.en: That's what I pictured for us.
translation.zh: ‎那才是我对我们婚礼的设想

translation.en: [sighs] You and me, a few special guests, my family's land.
translation.zh:
‎有你有我 请一些特别的宾客
‎在我家的土地上

translation.en: But you wouldn't know that, would you? Because you never asked me.
translation.zh:
‎但你不会知道我的想法的 对吧？
‎因为你从没问过我

translation.en: And I don't understand how you can stand there
translation.zh: ‎我不明白 我们经历过那么多

translation.en: and continue to keep secrets from me after everything we've been through.
translation.zh: ‎你怎么还能站在这里继续向我隐瞒！

translation.en: If you wanted to give me a secondhand ring,
translation.zh: ‎如果你想送我一枚二手戒指

translation.en: you could have asked me for Liam's.
translation.zh: ‎你可以问我要利亚姆送我的那枚

translation.en: It's cut better for my fat fingers, according to Victoria.
translation.zh:
‎按照维多利亚的说法
‎更适合我的胖手指

translation.en: [Joseph] Victoria? What are you talking about--
translation.zh: ‎维多利亚？凯莉 你在说什么？

translation.en: I'm glad we came here
to realize that you belong in this city, Joseph.
translation.zh: ‎让我意识到 你是属于城市的 约瑟夫

translation.en: I don't.
All right. All right. Spit it out.
-The wine? -No! Not the wine!
No. Y… you said you wanted to walk and talk,
and so we walked and talked all the way up here.
translation.zh: ‎所以我们就一路走到这里了

translation.en: My calves hurt, and I know that you got more on your mind.
translation.zh:
‎我小腿都走疼了
‎我知道你有很多心事

translation.en: [smacks lips] You don't have to be afraid because I'm…
[mumbling] …falling in love with you.
-What? -What?
[smacks lips] I'm…
falling in love with you.
-Oh, wow, uh… -I'm sorry.
No. I just wasn't expecting--
-No, I get it. That's… that's fine. -That's why I was gonna…
translation.zh:
‎-没事 我懂的 没关系
‎-所以我才要…

translation.en: -Wow. Um… -Sorry.
I think I'm falling for you too.
I mean, I am.
I'm falling in love with you.
For real?
-[Brandy] Mm-hmm. -You are?
[chuckles] I am.
Okay, just…
Okay. You do so much for Callie
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你为凯莉和她的家人

translation.en: and her family
and this land. [exhales heavily]
I just…
I wanna know what you want.
Where do you see yourself
in, like, five, ten years?
[Victoria] Joseph? Joseph!
Well,
you got what you wanted.
What are you talking about?
[Joseph] You drove her away
because you're still not over that you and I didn't work out.
translation.zh:
‎因为我们没能走到最后
‎你还耿耿于怀

translation.en: [Victoria] Oh, Joseph,
tell me you're not blaming me for your lack of honesty.
translation.zh: ‎你总是对我不坦诚 不能怪我

translation.en: You know how much she means to me.
I didn't do anything wrong.
You only have yourself to blame.
[inhales] Besides,
seems like you both dodged a bit of a bullet.
What?
[smacks lips] I should probably cancel the venue.
Picture's in your email.
-Do you wanna talk about it now or later? -Nope!
translation.zh:
‎-你想现在说 还是过会再说？
‎-不要！

translation.en: You know, I was right.
I kept him on the farm all year long to avoid the inevitable.
translation.zh:
‎我让他整年待在农场里
‎以避免这些不必要的事端

translation.en: And… and a recycled ring from an ex-fiancée I knew nothing about?
translation.zh:
‎我完全不知道他有过未婚妻
‎他送我的是二手戒指啊？

translation.en: -God! -Maybe there's more to this story.
It doesn't matter. For him to even consider that I'd uproot my life
translation.zh: ‎不重要了 难道为了他 我要背井离乡

translation.en: and leave everything behind?
What is that face?
[smacks lips] Wasn't that what he did for you this past year?
translation.zh: ‎这不正是他过去一年为你所做的吗？

translation.en: No!
Yes! But it's not the same thing.
[Brandy] Okay.
[smacks lips] Well, at least the farm is still standing, huh?
translation.zh: ‎好了 至少农场还在 对吧？

translation.en: We didn't burn it down.
How's Manny?
[high-pitched] He's good!
So good.
[Joseph] I know I royally messed up.
translation.zh: ‎我知道我又以皇室的方式搞砸了

translation.en: -[Leo] Again. -[Joseph] Again.
But Owen and Callie?
It just doesn't seem right. It's… it's her dead fiancé's brother.
translation.zh:
‎这似乎不太对
‎欧文是她过世未婚夫的哥哥

translation.en: Like, what?
Things aren't always what they seem. Let the dust settle.
translation.zh: ‎所见未必是真相 先别太早下结论

translation.en: Call her in a few days.
You've got the gala tomorrow night.
translation.zh: ‎你先集中精力在明晚的庆典上

translation.en: Focus on that. She'll come around before the wedding.
translation.zh:
‎你先集中精力在明晚的庆典上 ‎-她会在婚礼前回心转意的
‎-什么婚礼？

translation.en: What wedding?
translation.zh:
‎-她会在婚礼前回心转意的
‎-什么婚礼？

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Excuse me.
I'll take that.
-Do you still have the paperwork? -Of course.
With Callie and I up in the air, my dad's legacy is all I have.
translation.zh:
‎凯莉和我前途未卜
‎我只剩我爸的遗产了

translation.en: And I have a feeling that she's not coming back.
I think you're right.
From what she's posting on social media, she's on island.
translation.zh: ‎从她发的朋友圈来看 她在…

translation.en: Ugh.
What is wrong with you? I was talking about Callie!
But thank you. I can't unsee that.
translation.zh: ‎但是谢谢 我要去洗眼睛了

translation.en: What is it you really want?
I wanna marry Callie.
She wants to marry you too.
She just can't marry two of me.
[Leo] Well, who's the real you?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 哪个才是真正的你？

translation.en: [Callie exhales] Here we go.
Good luck.
-Han? -[Hannah] Not hungry.
Okay.
I saw the tree!
You guys did a great job. How'd you get so many lights to fit?
translation.zh:
‎你们装饰得真好
‎怎么挂上去那么多灯的？

translation.en: [Hannah] Manny helped because you weren't here.
translation.zh: ‎因为你不在 都是靠曼尼帮忙

translation.en: I got stitches.
I heard you were the best stitches patient that doctor had ever seen.
translation.zh:
‎我听说 你是医生见过的
‎最听话的外伤病人

translation.en: -I didn't cry. -I don't doubt it.
Where's Joseph?
Uh, he's… he's not back yet.
Oh boy.
Allow me, madame.
-[quietly] Thank you. -Mmm.
Hannah's not joining us?
Not until Joseph shows up.
-What? -[whispers] Tell her.
[whispers] Tell her what? You want me-- No. I'm not gonna tell her.
translation.zh:
‎告诉她什么？你想让我…
‎不要 我不会告诉她的

translation.en: -Tell her. -I'm not gonna tell her tonight. It's--
translation.zh: ‎我今晚不会跟她说的 不会…

translation.en: What is going on between you two?
[Manny] Okay. Last week, I saw her do something with her lips,
translation.zh: ‎好吧 上周我看到她在拨弄嘴唇

translation.en: and I knew… I knew at that moment that she wanted the goods!
translation.zh: ‎那一刻我就知道了 她想要点甜头！

translation.en: Okay. Hold-- Wait! Hold on. What? You guys are…
translation.zh: ‎好了 等等！等一下 什么？你们俩…

translation.en: You guys…
When I was gone. Am I getting this right? [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎我不在的时候 你们好上了 是吗？

translation.en: Wow. I mean, I'm so happy for you guys!
translation.zh: ‎我是说 我真为你们开心！

translation.en: Thank you.
Jeez, what else happened when I was gone?
translation.zh:
‎天啊 我不在的时候
‎还发生什么事了？

translation.en: -No! Hmm? -What?
No way. This is delicious. Thank you!
translation.zh: ‎不是吧 太好吃了 谢谢！

translation.en: -[exhales] -So good. -It's so good. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh:
‎-说真的 太好吃了
‎-太好吃了

translation.en: -And you're not gonna tell her? -I'm not. No.
-Can I tell her? -Mm-mm.
-[Brandy clears throat] -All right! Everything okay?
Okay.
Ten years ago,
when I moved to California, I had very few goals.
translation.zh: ‎在我搬到加州时 我没有太多目标

translation.en: Um, I thought I'd find a place to stay for free
and make enough money to buy some video games… [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎赚足够的钱 买电子游戏

translation.en: …but what I hadn't realized until I started working here
translation.zh:
‎但直到我开始在这里工作
‎我才意识到

translation.en: was I was searching for a family all along.
translation.zh: ‎我一直在期待能有一个家庭

translation.en: [choking up] I, uh… [clears throat] I've been on my own for a while now,
and, uh, this is the first time in my life
that I've ever felt like I belong somewhere.
You, Hannah, this land.
You're my family.
And, uh,
I love you guys. I would do anything for you all.
translation.zh: ‎我爱你们 我会为你做任何事

translation.en: Okay, I have cried enough in the past 24 hours.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 过去24小时 我已经哭很多次了

translation.en: -If you don't stop-- -Okay. I… I'll… I'll cut to the chase. Um…
translation.zh:
‎-如果你不停下来…
‎-好吧 那我说重点

translation.en: I plan on building a family of my own one day.
translation.zh: ‎我打算将来有一天 组建自己的家庭

translation.en: Give them the same joy and support and acceptance
translation.zh: ‎给他们同样的快乐、支持和接纳

translation.en: that you've given me, but I can't do that unless
translation.zh:
‎就像你给我的一样
‎但我必须有一片属于自己的土地

translation.en: I have a piece of land to call my own.
I've, um…
I've reworked some of the numbers here, and Manny can continue working here as is,
translation.zh:
‎我重新修改了一些数据
‎曼尼可以继续在这里工作

translation.en: but instead of being paid in full each month,
translation.zh: ‎但不是每个月都拿全额工资

translation.en: 15% can go towards purchasing a 12-acre plot out of your 200.
translation.zh:
‎15%可以用来从你的80平方公里土地
‎购买一块0.05平方公里的土地

translation.en: In five years, he can have ownership of the land for a fair price.
translation.zh:
‎五年后 他可以以合理的价格
‎拥有这片土地

translation.en: And there's this tree that gives this bomb-ass midafternoon shade
translation.zh:
‎那里还会有一棵树
‎能在午后给你提供荫凉

translation.en: that I think would be really--
-Yes! -What?
I can't believe I didn't think of this sooner.
translation.zh: ‎真不敢相信 我没有早点想到！

translation.en: Really? You'll sell me some of your land?
translation.zh: ‎真的吗？你要把部分土地卖给我吗？

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
-Yay! -[Manny] Thank you. This is awesome!
[inhales deeply] Manny, is everything okay?
-Is Callie there? -She is!
Can I talk to her?
He wants to know… You know what? I actually think she's busy.
translation.zh: ‎他想知道…知道吗？我觉得她很忙

translation.en: But listen, there's a lot I gotta tell you, okay?
translation.zh: ‎但是我有很多事要告诉你 好吗？

translation.en: I was thinking about my future, and I talked to Callie,
translation.zh: ‎我在考虑我的未来 我和凯莉谈过了

translation.en: and she'll let me buy some of the land. Isn't that great? I mean, it's perfect! There's this great spot…
translation.zh:
‎她允许我买一些土地 很棒吧？
‎我是说 太完美了！

translation.en: [mom] Oh, I'm sorry, baby.
I really should have paid to have it stored properly.
translation.zh: ‎我真应该花钱 把裙子妥善保存好

translation.en: It's so beautiful.
-You're beautiful. -[scoffs]
Well, what do you think? I don't know!
-Go try it on! -Can I try it on?
-Yes! -Okay.
[mom] Oh my gosh!
Oh, honey, it's stunning.
-I really like it. -You do?
-Mm-hmm. -Okay.
I just… [exhales]
I hope for a marriage as good as you and Dad.
translation.zh: ‎我希望能有你和爸爸那样的婚姻

translation.en: Have I ever told you the story of the invisible backpack?
translation.zh: ‎我跟你讲过隐形背包的故事吗？

translation.en: -[chuckles] No. -No.
Well, see, when we're born,
we all come with this invisible backpack,
you know, to put your experiences and… and your memories in.
translation.zh: ‎把自己的经历和记忆装进去

translation.en: You know, for some people, well, that backpack just weighs a few pounds.
translation.zh: ‎对有些人来说 背包只有几公斤重

translation.en: Gosh, you hardly even notice it's there.
But for others, it can feel like the weight of the world
translation.zh: ‎但对其他人来说 会感觉自己肩膀上

translation.en: just sits on their shoulders.
And sometimes, you don't find out what's in your partner's backpack
translation.zh: ‎有时候 直到你步入婚姻 你才会发现

translation.en: until you are well into a marriage.
That's okay.
We all have baggage, you know?
Parts of ourselves we'd rather keep hidden
and tucked away even from those we love the most.
translation.zh: ‎甚至不让我们最爱的人知道

translation.en: You have to accept what's in your partner's backpack
translation.zh: ‎你必须接纳伴侣背包里的东西

translation.en: before its contents are revealed…
translation.zh: ‎赶在其中的内容被揭露之前…

translation.en: or else you'll have a very long and rocky road ahead of you.
translation.zh: ‎否则你将面临一段漫长坎坷的道路

translation.en: You have to carry each other's burdens.
translation.zh: ‎你们必须肩负起彼此的重担

translation.en: But, Mama, I think I know everything there is to know about Liam. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎但是 妈妈 我觉得
‎我对利亚姆已经了如指掌了

translation.en: I… I know you do, baby, but
translation.zh: ‎我知道你很了解他 但是…

translation.en: there may come a day when you see something in him that he was
translation.zh: ‎也许有一天 你会在他身上看到 ‎他不敢向你展示的东西

translation.en: afraid to show you.
But hey, you know his heart. Right?
translation.zh: ‎但你知道他的内心 对吧？

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Forgiveness is a superpower!
-"Seventy times seven." -Yeah.
-[mom] I love you. -[Callie] I love you too.
Hey.
-Hey! -I'm sorry.
Oh. No, hon, I'm sorry, okay?
translation.zh: ‎不要 亲爱的 是我对不起 好吗？

translation.en: I got so overwhelmed and busy. I should have checked in with you more.
translation.zh: ‎我太忙了 我应该多跟你交流的

translation.en: Are you and Joseph still getting married?
[smacks lips] Hey. You and me are a team. Okay?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 你和我是亲姐妹 好吗？

translation.en: I promise to never be too busy for my little sister ever again. Okay?
translation.zh:
‎我保证再也不会
‎忙得顾不上我妹妹了 好吗？

translation.en: -Okay. -Do you forgive me?
-Yeah. -[chuckles] Let me see that cool scar!
Ouch. Did it hurt?
Keep your head up.
Love you, kid.
[Joseph] Hey.
Hey, man! Hi.
You have something you want to say to me?
Don't sweat it. You know, Callie said you guys have been struggling a bit.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 凯莉说你们最近有点困难

translation.en: Things happen.
Things happen?
Yeah, things happen in every relationship. That doesn't mean you can move in whenev--
translation.zh:
‎没错 每段感情都会有小插曲
‎但这并不意味着你可以插足…

translation.en: Move in on…
What are you talking about, man?
I'm talking about you and Callie. Who else would I be talking about?
translation.zh: ‎我在说你和凯莉 我还能说谁呢？

translation.en: I… I'm talking about the soup kitchen.
Callie and I are just friends.
She and my brother were high school sweethearts before he died.
translation.zh: ‎她和我弟弟在高中时就是情侣了

translation.en: I… I would never go there with her.
Yeah?
Then how do you explain this?
Someone must've taken that during the last performance.
translation.zh: ‎这是有人在上次表演时拍的

translation.en: Look, same costume. [chuckles]
Performance?
My Mother Mary walked out on me for a day, so Callie filled in for her.
translation.zh:
‎我们的圣母玛丽那天放鸽子了
‎所以凯莉顶替她了

translation.en: -She didn't… she didn't tell you? -[sighs]
No, no. I think she forgot to mention it. [exhales]
translation.zh: ‎没有 她可能忘记提起了

translation.en: -I owe her one. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh:
‎我欠她一个人情
‎这些孩子坐了一天的公交车

translation.en: See, these kids spend all day on the bus just to come to watch the live show,
translation.zh:
‎我欠她一个人情
‎这些孩子坐了一天的公交车 ‎就为了来看现场表演

translation.en: see the donkey.
You know what? Uh,
don't pack up too much.
I think we can make budget cuts somewhere else.
translation.zh: ‎我们可以在其他地方削减一些预算的

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you, man. S… S… stick around for the show!
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 伙计 留下看表演吧！

translation.en: Mom?
Listen. I'm gonna cut to the chase because the service here is awful!
translation.zh:
‎听着 我就开门见山了
‎因为这里的手机信号太糟糕了！

translation.en: Victoria said the wedding's off. What happened?
translation.zh: ‎维多利亚说婚礼取消了 怎么回事？

translation.en: Look, I… I thought we could do it all.
But you should have seen her.
translation.zh: ‎但你应该见见她 她凭一己之力

translation.en: I mean, she was single-handedly closing suppliers we never would've locked in.
translation.zh: ‎但你应该见见她 她凭一己之力 ‎就搞定了我们一直没有摆平的供应商

translation.en: That doesn't surprise me.
And I completely ruined it.
Neither does that.
How could you leave me with this decision?
Because I knew you'd make the right one!
translation.zh: ‎因为我知道 你会做出正确的抉择！

translation.en: How?
Before your father started the business, it was an idea
translation.zh:
‎你父亲做生意之前 ‎那只是我们
‎在单间公寓里面的一个想法

translation.en: in our one-bedroom apartment.
translation.zh:
‎那只是我们
‎在单间公寓里面的一个想法

translation.en: Even though the money came along, it was never about that.
translation.zh: ‎即使赚钱了 但赚钱从来不是关键

translation.en: If your father were here,
he'd tell you he didn't work a day in his life.
translation.zh: ‎他会告诉你 他一生都不是在工作

translation.en: When your father died, I… I got lost in it all. I…
translation.zh: ‎你父亲去世以后 我完全迷失了 我…

translation.en: The city, the money.
You and Callie showed me what it was like to follow my heart.
translation.zh:
‎你和凯莉让我明白
‎要如何追随自己的内心

translation.en: It led me here!
I'll never be able to thank you enough.
So, where does that leave me?
Make it right, Joseph.
You did it once. You can do it again.
translation.zh: ‎你以前做到了 可以再做一次的

translation.en: Hi, Mom.
God, I miss you.
This isn't easy.
"Seventy times seven"?
Seems like one too many mistakes.
translation.zh: ‎感觉已经超出原谅的限度了

translation.en: But you were right.
I know his heart.
I love him.
I would forgive him 1,000 more times if I had to.
translation.zh: ‎如果有必要 我会再原谅他一千次

translation.en: Am I crazy? [chuckles]
I wish you could be here.
The God of the universe came to us in the form of a tiny, lowly baby.
translation.zh:
‎上帝以弱小的婴儿形象
‎出现在我们面前

translation.en: Not with red carpets, limousines,
translation.zh: ‎没有红地毯 没有豪华轿车

translation.en: paparazzi, and press releases,
translation.zh: ‎没有狗仔队 没有新闻稿

translation.en: but silently,
in the quiet of the night.
This time of year, we…
we tend to look out at the hustle and bustle
translation.zh: ‎我们倾向于看到世界的熙熙攘攘

translation.en: of the world's busy lives,
and for once, we become more interested in people than in things.
translation.zh:
‎而这一次
‎我们会变得更关注人 而不是物质

translation.en: The best things in life
aren't things at all.
So, let us keep the spirit of Christmas in our hearts.
translation.zh: ‎所以让我们把圣诞节的精神铭记于心

translation.en: Well,
this is as good as it gets without Victoria's fancy wardrobe.
translation.zh:
‎没有维多利亚的华丽衣服
‎也很好看呢

translation.en: Hey, you're perfect!
Who needs designer brands when you got a body like that?
translation.zh: ‎拥有这样的身材 谁还需要名牌呢？

translation.en: Let's do this.
Let's.
[inhales] Thank you.
[Victoria whining] Joseph, you can't do this!
-I can, and I already did. -But this is suicide!
translation.zh:
‎-我可以的 我已经做了
‎-但这是自杀！

translation.en: What do I tell the board members? The guests arrive in 20 minutes, Joseph.
translation.zh:
‎我要怎么跟董事会成员说？
‎客人们20分钟后就到了 约瑟夫

translation.en: I don't know. Uh, have them stay at one of our hotels for the weekend.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道
‎让他们在我们的酒店过周末吧

translation.en: Or better yet, have them turn their private jets around
translation.zh: ‎最好让他们把私人飞机调头

translation.en: so they can go home for the holidays.
[Harry] Too late.
[gasps] Harry.
Gentlemen,
believe me, I will take care of everything.
translation.zh: ‎相信我 我会处理好一切的

translation.en: Joseph doesn't realize the importance of this evening.
translation.zh: ‎约瑟夫不知道今晚的重要性

translation.en: [Joseph] Merry Christmas, Harry.
How's the wife, kids?
They're fine.
How old is your youngest?
Is he… He was nine? Ten?
Eight.
Uh, where are you going with this, Joseph? We have no time.
translation.zh: ‎你要闹哪样 约瑟夫 ？我们没时间了

translation.en: I saw a kid today.
He didn't have shoes on, and he was about your son's age.
translation.zh: ‎他没有鞋穿 跟你的儿子年纪相仿

translation.en: Yeah, he took four buses to get a hot cup of soup.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 他坐了四趟车 只为喝碗热汤

translation.en: Barefoot.
Now, in here we are about to assemble millions of dollars,
translation.zh: ‎而我们在这里 准备筹集数百万美元

translation.en: and honestly, for what?
When my dad offered you the CFO position,
translation.zh: ‎当我爸爸给你首席财务官的职位时

translation.en: why'd you take the job?
My family. The kids.
Yet here you are, away from your family,
translation.zh: ‎但你在这里 ‎远离家人 距离圣诞节只有几天了

translation.en: just days before Christmas,
translation.zh: ‎远离家人 距离圣诞节只有几天了

translation.en: and you're focused on work.
The Bernet Farms taught me that simple can be better.
translation.zh: ‎贝奈特农场教会我 简单可以更好

translation.en: That having less can sometimes mean having more.
translation.zh: ‎追求更少 有时意味着拥有更多

translation.en: I'm stepping in as acting CEO
of Van Aston Enterprises effective immediately.
translation.zh: ‎执行总裁一职 立即生效

translation.en: There will be a shift in the company,
from caring solely about the shareholders to also caring about the community.
translation.zh: ‎从只关心股东 变成也关心社区

translation.en: And you might not like to hear this, but 10% of our annual profits
translation.zh:
‎你可能不喜欢我的决定
‎但我们年利润的10%

translation.en: will go to multiple charities around the city.
translation.zh: ‎将捐给市内的各种慈善机构

translation.en: What profits?
I consider all of you family. I do.
And I hope this doesn't change our working relationship.
translation.zh: ‎我希望这不会改变我们的工作关系

translation.en: But if it does…
maybe that's okay.
Oh, and if you're hungry, I hear the soup kitchen next door
translation.zh: ‎如果你饿了 我听说隔壁的施舍处

translation.en: has quite the spread.
-[sighs heavily] -[Callie] I could eat.
[Callie] That was quite the speech back there.
I meant every word.
And I know an apology can't change the fact that I kept something from you for so long.
translation.zh:
‎我知道 道歉改变不了
‎我对你一直有所隐瞒的事实

translation.en: I forgive you.
That's it? [Callie exhales] That's it.
That speech back there?
That is the Joseph I've known for the last year,
translation.zh: ‎那才是我去年认识的约瑟夫

translation.en: and that is the Joseph that I would like to marry.
-You still wanna marry me? -[both chuckle]
'Cause I… I'll do anything.
I will. I… I don't need the city. I know that now. I just--
translation.zh:
‎我会的 我不需要城市
‎我现在知道了 我…

translation.en: I'm not gonna make you give up your life here.
translation.zh: ‎我不会让你放弃这里的生活

translation.en: We'll figure something out.
And besides, you've got a lot of work to do.
Multiple charities?
You can't do that all from Petaluma, can you?
translation.zh: ‎你不能在佩塔卢马做这些事吧？

translation.en: -And about the wedding-- -Yeah, about that. We lost the venue.
translation.zh:
‎-关于婚礼…
‎-是的 关于婚礼 ‎我们的场地泡汤了

translation.en: I have another idea.
Uh, Victoria, can I talk to you for a second?
translation.zh: ‎维多利亚 我能跟你聊聊吗？

translation.en: [Joseph] You know I think fondly of our years together.
translation.zh: ‎你知道我很怀念我们在一起的日子

translation.en: You are hardworking and ambitious.
You're exactly the kind of person that people expected
Joseph Van Aston to marry.
I know it's… it's long overdue, but…
translation.zh: ‎我知道早就该这样做了 但是…

translation.en: I'm really sorry,
and I hope you'll forgive me.
What was your excuse again?
"Marriage just isn't for me, V."
translation.zh: ‎“结婚不适合我 维多利亚”

translation.en: [inhales] I always thought I'd be the one who tamed the lion.
translation.zh: ‎我一直以为 我会是驯服狮子的人

translation.en: Watching Callie parade around with that rock on her finger was just--
translation.zh:
‎看着凯莉手指上
‎戴着那块钻石走来走去 真是…

translation.en: Oh, the rock that you said once was on your finger?
translation.zh: ‎就是你说你曾戴过的钻石吗？

translation.en: -Joseph-- -[Joseph] I'm not trying to fight.
translation.zh:
‎-约瑟夫
‎-我不是想吵架 只是…

translation.en: If I remember right, you kept the ring that I gave you.
translation.zh:
‎如果我没记错
‎我给你的戒指 还在你手里呢

translation.en: Turned it into a beautiful pair of half diamond studs.
translation.zh: ‎我把它改成一对漂亮的钻石耳钉了

translation.en: Let's see if they fit!
Why now? After so many years?
translation.zh:
‎为什么是现在呢？
‎已经过去那么多年了？

translation.en: Well, I guess I'm starting to realize that holding things in,
translation.zh: ‎我想我开始意识到 把事情憋在心里

translation.en: it can really hurt somebody.
Yeah? Merry Christmas!
Maybe you have changed, Joseph.
translation.zh: ‎也许你真是变了 约瑟夫

translation.en: I'm trying to prove it.
To you, to…
to everyone. [exhales]
-Joseph, that photo was-- -[Joseph] I know.
translation.zh:
‎-约瑟夫 那张照片…
‎-我知道

translation.en: It's okay.
All right. Have fun tonight. Okay?
translation.zh: ‎好了 今晚玩得开心点 好吗？

translation.en: Hey, Joseph hasn't introduced us yet.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 约瑟夫还没介绍我们认识

translation.en: I'm Owen.
♪ I love you in a forever kind of way ♪
Joseph! Joseph, um…
-What? -I… I just got… [exhales]
-What? What? -It's time! It's time!
-For what? -The baby's coming! Hurry!
translation.zh:
‎-什么是时候了？
‎-宝宝要生了！快点！

translation.en: -I'll get my truck! -No time for that!
-I'm gonna be a dad. -Yes, you are gonna be a dad! [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎-我要当爸爸了
‎-是的 你要当爸爸了

translation.en: [Callie] Joseph!
